title: Environmental Science Literacy Enhancement Program through Mobile Outdoor Collaborative Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Learners engage in collaborative activities analyzing local environmental issues using mobile devices and VR simulations, with potential mixed-group composition of non-degree adult learners and teenagers.

learning_goals: Learners can apply mobile technology-based data collection and sharing protocols to scientifically analyze local environmental issues.
Learners can perform mathematical analysis (statistics/graph interpretation) for evidence-based decision-making on environmental issues with 80% accuracy.
Learners successfully participate three or more times in writing reports using scientific terminology (e.g., carbon footprint, ecosystem services) during collaborative inquiry.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
